definition: Magnetic vector and scalar data for monitoring and calibration purposes
description: The MAGx_CA_1B Product contains magnetic calibration data for monitoring, verification, and re-estimation of calibration parameters. It contains raw as well as processed VFM vector measurements, VFM temperatures, and fully converted and corrected ASM measurements at 1 Hz rate. This is essentially the data used for the Temporal Calibration File (TCF.VFM) estimation but including also the raw VFM data.

B_pre,nT,"Pre-calibrated VFM magnetic field vector, VFM frame, time Time+dt",3,CDF_DOUBLE
EU_VFM,eu,"Raw VFM measuremet, time Time+dt_VFM",3,CDF_DOUBLE
T_CDC,C,"Temperature of VFM CDC, time Time+dt_VFM",1,CDF_DOUBLE

alpha,deg,"Solar inclination angle, rotation about y axis, S/C frame, time Time+dt",1,CDF_DOUBLE
beta,deg,"Solar inclination angle, angle to y axis, S/C frame, time Time+dt",1,CDF_DOUBLE
